text:
Fantastic news this week that the #NHS & #Vertex agreed terms to be able to prescribe life changing drugs to #cysticfibrosis sufferers!👍🏻
Hopefully #NICE will next approve the prescribing of medicinal #cannabis to improve the lives of thousands with #Epilepsy #Cancer #MS etc.🤞🏻 https://t.co/XCtPrJg8JZ
